mapper.select: SELECT pt.ptNo, u.userNo, u.userId, u.name, u.profileimg, to_char(pt.endDate, 'yyyymmdd') endDate, pt.regcount, pt.schedulecount FROM users u, (SELECT p.ptNo, p.userNo, p.endDate, p.regCount, s.schedulecount FROM pt p, (SELECT ptNo, COUNT(scheduleNo) scheduleCount FROM schedule GROUP BY ptNo) s WHERE p.ptno = s.ptno AND p.trainerno = #{userNo}) pt WHERE u.userNo = pt.userno
